author: Lyle Graff
comment: I really like this app but as of today i have a real problem with it! I've been seeing this guy popping up on all kinds of apps in their feeds named Tom Steyer and he's trying to get people to sign a petition for people to impeach president Trump! I don't think people want to see this political garbage he's putting out there on our feeds in our apps! I sure don't and if it continues I'll be forced to uninstall this app or any others i see this trash in! 😒

reply.author: Drippler
reply.content:
Hi there Lyle. Thanks for your feedback.

If you think an article or a Drip seems irrelevant to you, please let us know from our in-app support and we'll try to help you.

Thanks for using Drippler.

author: Allen Powers
comment: A lot of the same stuff over and over. You frequently say how great an app is and yet many of them are rated garbage. It's more ads these days than useful information. What happened to you?

reply.author: Drippler
reply.content:
Hi there Allen. We're sorry to hear that.

The majority of our drips aren’t sponsored.  However, we weave in some sponsored drips in order to cover the costs that are associated with running and updating the app. We put lots of efforts to make sponsored drips less intrusive and as relevant as possible.

Thanks for using Drippler.

author: Amber Bilek-Egbert
comment: This is a must have. Gives me great tips, ideas, and info for my specific phone. Plus teaches me how to do things i never even knew i could do on it. Like i said AMAZING!!

reply.author: Drippler
reply.content:
Hey there Amber.

Thanks for your awesome feedback, we appreciate it!! We always do our best to further improve the app to make your experience even better.

author: Alp Şehiç
comment: The share menu inside the news is totally messed up. I cannot share them in major apps like WhatsApp, Telegram; because they are not present. And in the case of the selected app, it opens another application to share :-O.

reply.author: Drippler
reply.content:
Hey there Alp. Thanks for your feedback.

Can you please provide more info about this issue so we can try to check the issue ASAP?

Thanks for using Drippler.

author: Jeffrey DeMarie
comment: Same old stuff over and over. Hyperbolic praise for apps that get poor ratings on the Play Store. I know it's only an aggregator, but a little editorial oversight might be useful.

reply.author: Drippler
reply.content:
Hi there Jeffrey. Thanks for your feedback.

We always do our best to provide relevant and up-to-date Drips in order to make your experience a 5-star one.
If you encounter any apps or games which you think are not relevant, let us know.

Thanks for using Drippler.
